entry.title: My First Post
entry.content: 大家好！ヽ(✿ﾟ▽ﾟ)ノ 刚刚搞定了自己的博客！以后就在这里记录、分享我的心情和知识啦！ 米娜桑要多来捧场哦！ The Zen of Python, by Tim Peters1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829Beautiful is better than ugly. 优美胜于丑陋Explicit is better than implicit. 明了胜于晦涩Simple is better than complex. 简单胜过复杂Complex is better than complicated. 复杂胜过凌乱Flat is better than nested. 扁平胜于嵌套Sparse is better than dense. 间隔胜于紧凑Readability counts. 可读性很重要Special cases are not special enough to break the rules. 即使假借特例的实用性之名，也不违背这些规则Although practicality beats purity. 虽然实用性次于纯度Errors should never pass silently. 错误不应该被无声的忽略Unless explicitly silenced. 除非明确的沉默 In the face of ambiguity, refuse the temptation to guess. There should be one-- and preferably only one --obvious way to do it. 当存在多种可能时，不要尝试去猜测, 应该有一个, 最好只有一个, 明显能做到这一点Although that way may not be obvious at first unless you are Dutch.虽然这种 方式可能不容易，除非你是python之父Now is better than never. 现在做总比不做好Although never is often better than *right* now. 虽然不做往往比现在才做好(宁缺毋滥)If the implementation is hard to explain, it is a bad idea. 如果这个实现不容易解释，那么它肯定是坏主意If the implementation is easy to explain, it may be a good idea. 如果这个实现容易解释，那么它很可能是个好主意Namespaces are one honking great idea -- let is do more of those! 命名空间是一种绝妙的理念，应当多加利用 好啦~第一篇就到此结束了！博客的使用流程已经熟练了，希望以后能多分享一些干货！ 大家拜拜ヾ(￣▽￣)Bye~Bye~

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
